009package imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.multiply;
013import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.normL2;
014import static java.lang.Math.cos;
015import static java.lang.Math.sin;
016import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
017
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
021import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
022import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
023
024/**
025 * Represents an algebraic ellipse with the implicit equation
026 * A x^2 + B x y + C y^2 + D x + E y + F = 0.
027 * Parameters A, ..., F are normalized such that B^2 - 4 A C = -1.
028 * Instances are immutable.
029 * 
030 * @author WB
031 */
032public class AlgebraicEllipse {
033        
034        /**
035         * Ellipse parameters.
036         */
037        public final double A, B, C, D, E, F;
038        
039        /**
040         * Constructor.
041         * Creates a {@link AlgebraicEllipse} instance by normalizing the
042         * supplied parameters [A,...,F] such that d = B^2 - 4 A C = -1.
043         * Throws an exception if d is non-negative.
044         * 
045         * @param A parameter A
046         * @param B parameter B
047         * @param C parameter C
048         * @param D parameter D
049         * @param E parameter E
050         * @param F parameter F
051         */
052        public AlgebraicEllipse(double A, double B, double C, double D, double E, double F) {
053                double d = sqr(B) - 4 * A * C;
054                if (d > -Arithmetic.EPSILON_DOUBLE) {   // discriminant (d) must be negative!
055                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("illegal ellipse parameters, non-negative discriminant " + d);
056                }
057                // d < 0
058                // normalize to B^2 - 4 A C = -1
059                double s = 1 / sqrt(-d);
060                if (A >= 0) {
061                        this.A = A * s;
062                        this.B = B * s;
063                        this.C = C * s;
064                        this.D = D * s;
065                        this.E = E * s;
066                        this.F = F * s;
067                }
068                else {
069                        this.A = -A * s;
070                        this.B = -B * s;
071                        this.C = -C * s;
072                        this.D = -D * s;
073                        this.E = -E * s;
074                        this.F = -F * s;
075                }
076        }
077        
078        /**
079         * Constructor. Creates a {@link AlgebraicEllipse} instance from the
080         * specified parameter vector [A,...,F].
081         * 
082         * @param p algebraic ellipse parameters
083         */
084        public AlgebraicEllipse(double[] p) {
085                this(p[0], p[1], p[2], p[3], p[4], p[5]);
086        }
087        
088        /**
089         * Constructor. Creates a {@link AlgebraicEllipse} instance from
090         * a {@link GeometricEllipse}.
091         * 
092         * @param ge a {@link GeometricEllipse}
093         */
094        public AlgebraicEllipse(GeometricEllipse ge) {
095                this(getAlgebraicEllipseParameters(ge));
096        }
097        
098        private static double[] getAlgebraicEllipseParameters(GeometricEllipse ge) {
099                double ra = ge.ra;
100                double rb = ge.rb;
101                double xc = ge.xc;
102                double yc = ge.yc;
103                double theta = ge.theta;
104                
105                double cosT = cos(theta);
106                double sinT = sin(theta);
107                
108                double A = sqr(ra * sinT) + sqr(rb * cosT);
109                double B = 2 * (sqr(rb) - sqr(ra)) * sinT * cosT;
110                double C = sqr(ra * cosT) + sqr(rb * sinT);
111                double D = -2 * A * xc - B * yc;
112                double E = -2 * C * yc - B * xc;
113                double F = A * sqr(xc) + B * xc * yc + C * sqr(yc) - sqr(ra * rb);      
114                return new double[] {A, B, C, D, E, F};
115        }
116        
117        /**
118         * Return a vector of parameters for this ellipse.
119         * The length of the vector and the meaning of the parameters depends
120         * on the concrete ellipse type.
121         * 
122         * @return a vector of parameters [A, B, C, D, E, F]
123         */
124        public double[] getParameters() {
125                return new double[] {A, B, C, D, E, F};
126        }
127        
128        public double getAlgebraicDistance(Pnt2d p) {
129                double x = p.getX();
130                double y = p.getY();
131                return A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;
132        }
133        
134        public double getSampsonDistance(Pnt2d p) {
135                double x = p.getX();
136                double y = p.getY();
137                double ad = A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;    // algebraic distance
138                double nGrad = Math.hypot(2*A*x + B*y + D, 2*C*y + B*x + E);
139                return ad / nGrad;
140        }
141        
142        public double getGoncharovaDistance(Pnt2d p) {
143                double x = p.getX();
144                double y = p.getY();
145                double G = A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;     // algebraic distance
146                
147                double[] gV = {2*A*x + B*y + D, 2*C*y + B*x + E};
148                double ngV = normL2(gV);
149                double sd = G / ngV;
150                
151                double[][] H = {{ 2*A, B }, { B, 2*C }};
152                double gd = sd * (1 + G * Matrix.dotProduct(multiply(gV, H), gV) / (2 * Math.pow(ngV, 4)));
153                return gd;
154        }
155        
156        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
157        
158        @Override
159        public boolean equals(Object other) {
160                if (this == other) {
161                        return true;
162                }
163                if (!(other instanceof AlgebraicEllipse)) {
164            return false;
165        }
166                return this.equals((AlgebraicEllipse) other, Arithmetic.EPSILON_DOUBLE);
167        }
168        
169        public boolean equals(AlgebraicEllipse other, double tolerance) {
170                return 
171                                Arithmetic.equals(A, other.A, tolerance) &&
172                                Arithmetic.equals(B, other.B, tolerance) &&
173                                Arithmetic.equals(C, other.C, tolerance) &&
174                                Arithmetic.equals(D, other.D, tolerance) &&
175                                Arithmetic.equals(E, other.E, tolerance) &&
176                                Arithmetic.equals(F, other.F, tolerance) ;
177        }
178        
179        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
180        
181        public AlgebraicEllipse duplicate() {
182                return new AlgebraicEllipse(this.getParameters());
183        }
184        
185        @Override
186        public String toString() {
187                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s %s", 
188                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), 
189                                Matrix.toString(getParameters()));
190        }
191        
192        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
193        
194//      public static void main(String[] args) {
195//              PrintPrecision.set(9);
196//              GeometricEllipse eg  = new GeometricEllipse(150, 50, 150, 150, 0.5);
197//              System.out.println("eg = " + eg);
198//              AlgebraicEllipse ea = new AlgebraicEllipse(eg);
199//              System.out.println("ea = " + ea);
200//              
201//              Pnt2d p = Pnt2d.from(300, 300);
202//              System.out.println("p  = " + p);
203//              Pnt2d pc = eg.getClosestPoint(p);
204//              System.out.println("pc = " + pc);
205//              
206//              System.out.println("Sampson dist(p) = " + ea.getSampsonDistance(p));
207//              System.out.println("Gonch dist(p) = " + ea.getGoncharovaDistance(p));
208//              
209//      }
210
211}
